com.neocampus.wifishared.receivers

Class OnAlarmReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.neocampus.wifishared.receivers.OnAlarmReceiver

  • public class OnAlarmReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    OnAlarmReceiver permet d'installer une alarme et d'être informé lors de son activation

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

        android.content.BroadcastReceiver.PendingResult
